/**
 * ensure `min <= n <= max`
 */export var clamp=function clamp(n,min,max){return Math.max(Math.min(n,max),min);};/**
 * get pseudo random index in range `[0; maxExcl)`
 */export var getPseudoRandomIdx=function getPseudoRandomIdx(maxExcl){return Math.round(Math.random()*(maxExcl-1));};/**
 * convert from 2D to 1D index
 */export var to1DIdx=function to1DIdx(cols){return function(i,j){return i*cols+j;};};
